snippet: Opposition lawmakers have seized on the case, and the victim’s sister said the police could have saved her life if they had begun a search immediately.
abstract: Haryana, India, police arrest 8 men for brutal rape and murder of 28-year-old mentally impaired Nepali woman; sister of victim holds if police would have responded earlier to her report that woman might not have died; medical examiner describes killing as most brutal he has seen in 29 years.
lead_paragraph: Opposition lawmakers have seized on the case, and the victim’s sister said the police could have saved her life if they had begun a search immediately.

headline.main: After Criticism, India Police Arrest 8 in Haryana Rape-Murder
headline.print_headline: India: Eight Are Arrested in Rape and Killing
